metadata.title: CVE-2019-11935 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient boundary checks when processing a string in mb_ereg_replaceallows access to out-of-bounds memory. This issue affects HHVM versionsprior to 3.30.12, all versions between 4.0.0 and 4.8.5, all versionsbetween 4.9.0 and 4.23.1, as well as 4.24.0, 4.25.0, 4.26.0, 4.27.0,4.28.0, and 4.28.1.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
